context.p: From a structural point of view, a book consists of different page types and the pages contain different regions with different structures and content. In particular, the TextRegion can be specified in more detail as a column title, heading, paragraph region, and so on... Within these regions, the individual texts can show typographical features that can also be labelled..
Depending on the level of capture (Structure GT Level), layout and structure analysis should generally include the following:

step.cmd: Marking of the page margin as well as looking at the print space.
Marking of particular regions on a page
